meanings.definition: Electrophiles: Molecules or ions that are attracted to electrons and tend to accept an electron pair in chemical reactions.
meanings.sent1: The electrophiles in the reaction eagerly accepted the electron pair.
meanings.sent2: Chemists study electrophiles to understand how they interact with other molecules.
meanings.sent3: The electrophiles at the party were always looking to pair up with electrons.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, electrophiles are like magnets for electron pairs.
meanings.sent5: The classroom demonstration vividly showed how electrophiles react with different substances.
